title: Our heritage
brief_description: Shows examples of carvings, statuary and sculpture to be found in religious temples and shrines in the Deccan area of Southern India. Hindu, Buddhist, Bravidiah and Muslem architecture are represented.
description: Shows examples of carvings, statuary and sculpture to be found in religious temples and shrines in the Deccan area of Southern India. Hindu, Buddhist, Bravidiah and Muslem architecture are represented.
